Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Reasonableness of immigration officer's decision on permanent residence application
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Doubts raised due to contradictions in testimonies
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Testimonial evidence, marriage details, living arrangements
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Marriage not genuine, primarily for status acquisition
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Timing of marriage and inconsistencies in testimony
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: IRPA s. 4 – invalid marriage for status acquisition
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Inconsistencies in testimonies about family and cohabitation
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Contradictions in accounts of relationship timeline and living arrangements
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Judicial review challenging reasonableness of decision
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Compliance with procedural fairness in assessment

Crimes.Crime_Name: Marriage Fraud under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Reasonableness of determination that marriage was non-genuine
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review of permanent residence refusal
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Doubts based on timing and inconsistent testimonies
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Testimony on family details, cohabitation, marriage timeline
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Marriage entered into primarily to obtain immigration status
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Marriage shortly after refugee status granted and testimony inconsistencies
Crimes.Application_Error: Minor errors in noting contradictions, but not determinative
Crimes.Application_Factor: Genuineness and legitimacy of marital relationship
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Whether the officer unreasonably concluded marriage was fraudulent
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: IRPA s. 4 – prohibition on marriages of convenience
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Inconsistencies in statements about shared life and family
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Contradictory accounts of relationship history and living situation
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge via judicial review on grounds of unreasonableness
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Fairness and thoroughness of officer’s credibility analysis
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility: Marriage not genuine, entered for immigration advantage
